oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Lyman Irvin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte-de-visite portrait of a US Army soldier in Battery F, 1st Mich. Arty. Irvin, of St. Joseph County, Mich., enlisted in 1861 for three years. He joined the army at Coldwater, Mich., and was discharged in Nashville on Jan. 14, 1865. In the studio photograph, Irvin is seated and is wearing a uniform with overcoat and vest. A crest-like badge is pinned on his vest. Photo by T. F. Saltsman, Nashville.
